Containers.Name: WatchState
Containers.Description: [b]Description[/b][br] [u]WatchState[/u] is a self-hosted service to sync your plex, jellyfin and emby play state. without relying on 3rd-party external services.[br] [b]Features[/b][br] * Sync backends play state (from many to many).[br] * Backup your backends play state into portable format.[br] * Receive Webhook events from media backends.[br] * Find un-matched or mis-matched items.[br] * Search your backend for title or item id.[br] * Display and filter your play state. Can be exported as yaml or json.[br] [b]Configuration[/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the application will store its configuration files, database and logs etc.[br] [b]Documentation[/b][br] Each command has a help documentation attached to it.[br] For more info please visit[br] https://github.com/ArabCoders/watchstate/blob/master/FAQ.md[br][br]

Variable.Name: WS_CRON_IMPORT
Variable.Description: Enable [1] or disable [0] The import task.

Variable.Name: WS_CRON_EXPORT
Variable.Description: Enable [1] or disable [0] The export task.

Variable.Name: WS_LOGGER_FILE_ENABLE
Variable.Description: Enable [1] or disable [0] log saving to files. Defaults to stdout.
